name: Treasure Quest
overview: A selectable answers text adventure published as a game of "The Big 100" collection. This program is an adventure, that is, it is a game set in an imaginary world that only the computer knows and you will try to get to know too. How? Just answer the questions your Commodore 64 asks you in kind. Let's take an example: at the beginning of the game, the program tells you that you are inside a cave and briefly describes the environment that surrounds you. It then gives you some indications regarding the direction to follow to recover the fabulous treasure: if you press the N key you will go North, S towards south and so on It is up to you, and above all your memory and imagination!
